replies.body:
Fight with all your Light bundle is bugged in the shop. It's showing Urgot instead of Xerath and costs like 43K something. 

Also nice job with the Definitely not Star Guardian bundle.

Hi!

That bug was totally my fault - I made a mistake and accidentally put in a buttload of Urgots into the bundle instead of one Xerath. I thought people would want dozens of Urgots _at the same time_ but turns out I was wrong - so now the bundle's up on the store correctly with Xerath instead of the hundred Urgots.

Sorry 'bout that c:
When Riot addresses Star Guardian Urgot meme with this bundle.....so sad{{item:3070}}
ICYMI, there's a picture of Lustboy in the "Where's the Bundle" bundle

It's been 2 years since Spirit Fire Brand came out will you please finally put him in the 50% sale instead of only offering him in bundles?
I'm a support main I don't want a bunch of mid skins.
